title: Liam Hemsworth has been spotted holding hands with a mystery ladyfriend
text:
Miley Cyrus has made it very clear that she's moved on from Liam Hemsworth (oh, and also Kaitlynn Carter).

Miley and Cody Simpson are very much Instagram official, and now it looks like Liam is keen to make a point that he's moved on too.

The actor, who split from wife Miley just two months ago, has been spotted holding hands with a mystery woman. Liam and his blonde ladyfriend were tootling around New York when they were snapped. The images are over on TMZ if you fancy a butchers.

We first heard that Miley and Liam had called time on their relationship back in August.

A source at E! reported that "they were drifting apart" and have been "trying to make it work for months". The insider claimed it had not happened that recently, adding, "Miley and Liam have still been communicating and it wasn't a messy split but they have decided they are at different points in their lives currently."

Soon after these rumours started doing the rounds, a source for Miley confirmed that she and Liam had indeed split. She released a statement (via People).

"Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time. Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is whatâ€™s best while they both focus on themselves and careers. They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart. Please respect their process and privacy."

After briefly dating Kaitlynn, Miley has now moved on with Cody, and they seem to be having a swell time. Lovely stuff.

description: But who is she? WHO IS SHE?!
